Text: Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
Uko̩o̩la e̩no̩ga ikpemute o̩jo̩ ku ma gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩ la de̩ kakini, Ma adʼu wʼugbo atama;
tak atama le̩ akwʼef uru dufu wʼo̩do̩da oñ atama le̩ ate̩jane̩ o̩la-wñ. I la che̩wñ kʼo̩ga ikpemute takpa o̩la e̩no̩ga le̩,
e̩gbale̩ atama añwa ñwu ma ku ma mʼudeju ame̩we̩ meji kʼaño̩la-ma fe̩ kowa manyʼoli sidar kpai ukpo ekpikpa kpai hiso̩p tod e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩ le̩;
tak atama añwa ñwu ma ku ma dʼe̩we̩ʼka kpa nyʼef e̩wñ eku ku ma ne̩ ama bo̩, ugbo kʼomi acha lʼofe-wñ.
I dʼe̩we̩ ki deju le̩ manyʼoli sidar kpai e̩wñ ekpikpa kpai hiso̩p le̩, oñ i akʼe-le̩ manyʼe̩we̩ ki deju le̩ tunyʼe̩bie̩ e-e̩we̩ ku ma kpa oji omi ki acha le̩;
tak i adʼe-le̩ tafio̩ o̩la e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma gworinyo̩ bʼo̩ga ikpemute-wñ te̩ le̩ onu mebie; tak i atojomu ñw u ka kʼi fe̩, oñ i atʼe̩we̩ ki deju le̩ no̩ tʼegbili.
Oñ e̩ne̩ ku ma gwʼo̩larinyo̩ le̩ a gwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ, i la alʼoji-wñ chaka, i agwʼo̩la-wñ ef omiofo, tak i afe̩; ubi le̩ tak i agudu wʼef uru, i muda agugu ejo̩do̩da unyabo-wñ o̩jo̩ mebie.
I lewatʼo̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ, i alʼoji-wñ kpai ilagba-wñ kpai igbegbeneju-wñ chaka; owñ chʼedudu du ki dʼoji-wñ i ala rinyo̩. Tak i a gwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ, kʼi agwʼo̩la-wñ onugo ef omifo, tak i afe̩.

Tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ i akʼamo̩ma okolo meji ku ma mufu kpai ole ala ki chʼo̩mo̩do̩ʼka kʼi mufu, tak i akpe̩ e̩fa omu ku ma no̩ te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ rʼe̩gwa kʼi mʼukpe̩-wñ me̩ta kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyu, ko kʼi che e̩wñ ele manyʼekpo e̩ñwa lo̩g oka.
Tak atama ki agwʼe̩ne̩ le̩ o̩la rinyo̩ adʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ache kʼi gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩, manyʼe̩wñ ki bo̩ le̩, gugu o̩gba Jihofa alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju.
Tak atama adʼo̩ma okolo le̩ʼka wa kʼi che e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ manyʼekpo e̩ñwa lo̩g oka le̩ tak i ako miejo o̩gba Jihofa kʼi mud e̩wñ ekowa emiejo;

tak i adʼo̩ma okolo le̩ kpa ugbo ku ma kpa e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, owñ chʼef uña kiafo̩ le̩; todu alu kʼatama ne̩ e̩la iche̩bo̩ adure, abe̩le̩ i ño̩ nʼe̩la iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ ge̩; e̩wñ efo̩ e-efo̩ i che.
Tak atama ache e̩bie̩ iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ le̩, oñ i adʼu kado oj eti awo̩to̩ e-e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩ le̩, kpai oj onu o̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩, kpai oj onu e̩re̩-wñ awo̩to̩.
Tak atama ache ekpo e̩ñwa lo̩g le̩, kʼi dʼu danyʼe̩dʼo̩wo̩ awohi-wñ onugo,
tak atama adʼo̩mo̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ tunyʼekpo̩ ki dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ awohi le̩, oñ i anʼo̩mo̩wo̩-wñ tʼekpo le̩ fio̩ o̩gba Jihofa onu mebie;
tak atama aba ekpo ki bo̩ ef o̩wo̩-wñ tʼoj eti awo̩to̩ e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩ le̩ kpai tʼoji onu o̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ kpai tʼoji onu e̩re̩-wñ awo̩to̩, noji e̩bie̩ iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ le̩;
tak atama le̩ adʼe̩bie̩ ki bo̩ ef o̩wo̩-wñ tʼoji e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩. Tak atama le̩ ache e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ o̩gba Jihofa.
Atama le̩ la achʼiche̩bo̩ adure kʼi che e̩wñ e̩boma tod e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩ bʼe̩daji-wñ te̩ le̩. Anubi e-le̩ tak i akpa e̩la iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo;
tak atama akʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpai e̩wñ ele wa chʼiche̩bo̩ oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩. Abe̩le̩ oñ atama ache e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ, tak i afe̩.

I la che̩wñ kʼi chʼe̩nubie̩ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ ma tu e̩wñ nana abe̩le̩ n, mak i adʼo̩ma alaʼka wa kʼi chʼiche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ ku ma amiejo, ku ma che e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ, kpai ukpe̩ e̩ke̩gwa e̩fa omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu tod e̩wñ ele-wñ, manyʼekpo e̩ñwa lo̩g oka;
kpai amo̩ma ikede meji, cho̩kpo̩ni i chʼamo̩ma o̩ke̩te̩be̩ meji, alu kʼo̩wo̩-wñ atu; oka-wñ la chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ adure, ekeji-wñ la chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo.
Tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ i akʼabʼe-le̩ wʼugbo atama kʼi gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩ alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju, o̩gba Jihofa;
tak atama adʼo̩mokolo iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ le̩ kpai ekpo e̩ñwa lo̩g oka wa oñ atama ami e-le̩ ejo todu iche̩bo̩ emiejo o̩gba Jihofa.

Tak i adʼo̩mo̩kolo e-abi eje̩ le̩ kpa; tak atama ache e̩bie̩ iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ le̩ pe̩, oñ i adʼu tʼoj eti awo̩to̩ e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩ le̩, kpai tʼoj onu o̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩, kpai tʼoj onu e̩re̩-wñ awo̩to̩.
Tak atama adʼekpo le̩ danyʼe̩do̩wo̩ e-wñ onugo awohi pe̩;
oñ i anʼo̩mo̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ dʼekpo kʼi dʼo̩wo̩-wñ awohi tafio̩ o̩gba Jihofa onu mebie;

tak atama le̩ la aba ekpo ki dʼo̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ tʼoj eti awo̩to̩ e-e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma gwo̩la rinyo̩ le̩ kpai tʼoj onu o̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ kpai tʼoj onu e̩re̩-wñ awo̩to̩, ugbo ku ma dʼe̩bie̩ iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ le̩ te̩;
tak ekpo ki bo̩, owñ chʼe-ki dʼe̩do̩wo̩ atama le̩ i adʼu tʼoj e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma gwo̩la rinyo̩, kʼi chʼe̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ o̩gba Jihofa.
Tak i adʼikedeʼka abe̩k amo̩mo̩ke̩te̩be̩ʼka wa che, owñ chʼalu kʼo̩wo̩-wñ tu,

alu kʼo̩wo̩-wñ tu le̩ oka-wñ chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ adure, ekeji-wñ la chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo manyʼe̩wñ ele kʼi aduwa le̩; oñ atama la ache e̩wñ e̩boma o̩gba Jihofa tod e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku mu gwo̩la rinyo̩ le̩.
E-le̩ chʼuko̩-o̩la ugbo e̩ne̩ kʼo̩ga ikpemute dʼo̩la-wñ, e-kʼo̩wo̩-wñ ma tu e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ egwo̩la rinyo̩ le̩ n.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kakini,
E̩gba ku me̩ lewʼane̩ Kenan e-kʼu nadu ñwu me̩ ku me̩ ne̩, kʼomi la mʼo̩ga ikpemute du tef unyiʼka oj ane̩ ku me̩ ne̩ le̩;
e̩gbale̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼunyi le̩ awa ka ñw atama kakini, Eju-mi i dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩gaʼka dʼef unyi-mi.
Tak atama le̩ añwa ñwu ma ku ma tʼunyi le̩ no̩ o̩dagbolo o̩gba tak atama anyʼejefu kʼi go o̩ga le̩, tode̩gba kʼi aka kʼe̩wñ du ki jʼef unyi le̩ mudaji; ubile̩ tak atama anyʼejefu kʼi go unyi le̩.
Tak i atejane̩ o̩ga le̩; i la che̩wñ kʼo̩ga le̩ dʼef o̩do̩ unyi dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩lo̩do̩ le̩ mubu, kʼi chemimi eju abe̩k ekpikpa, kʼi go kʼi la dabe̩ne̩ kʼi te̩ tʼejefu o̩do̩ le̩;
e̩gbale̩ atama adufu wʼalugbo̩na unyi le̩, kʼi la fʼo̩na unyi le̩ re o̩jo̩ mebie.
Tak atama le̩ adabi wa o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ, oñ i agʼo; i la che̩wñ kʼo̩ga le̩ mukpatuka bʼo̩lo̩do̩ unyi le̩ ma;
e̩gbale̩ tak atama añwa ñwu ma ku ma mʼokuta kʼo̩ga le̩ jʼefu-wñ chi ku ma mʼu ko rikpolo tʼugbo ki ma fe̩ n ejo̩do̩da ewo le̩;
tak i aje̩ ñwu ma fʼo̩lo̩do̩ unyi le̩ ña lʼejefu-wñ daka, taku ma akʼike̩te̩ ku ma ña rinyo̩ le̩ wa adafo ejo̩do̩da ewo le̩ ugbo ki ma fe̩ n;
taku ma akʼokuta omune̩ tunyʼe̩gu ugbo ku ma chi okuta le̩ kwo, oñ i anʼike̩te̩ omune̩ fʼolo̩do̩ unyi le̩ kwo̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼo̩ga le̩ ño̩ dabi tu dufu ef unyi le̩ abu kʼi mʼokuta-wñ chi, kʼi la fʼo̩lo̩do̩ unyi le̩ ña, kʼi la fʼu kwo,
e̩gbale̩ atama anyʼago; i la che̩wñ kʼo̩ga mukpatuka ef unyi le̩ mak o̩ga kʼi danyʼane̩ efu unyi le̩ i che: e̩wñ elifo̩ de̩.
Tak i agu unyi le̩ lo̩, tʼokuta-wñ, tʼigbo oli-wñ, tʼike̩te̩ unyi le̩ chaka; oñ i ako kwef ewo le̩ dufu tʼugbo ki ma fe̩ n.
Anubi le̩ ge̩, e̩ne̩ du kʼi mugudu tef unyi le̩ abu ku ma fu re, o̩la e̩ne̩ le̩ mudaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi dachi ef unyi le agwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ; oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼi aje̩ e̩wñ ef unyi le̩ agwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ.
I muda che̩wñ kʼatama le̩ lewa tejane̩, kʼo̩ga le̩ ma kpatuka ef unyi abu ku ma fʼu kwo̩ le̩ n, e̩gbale̩ tak atama atʼojomu ka kʼunyi le̩ fe̩ me̩, todabu kʼo̩ga-wñ takpa.
Tak i ane̩ ame̩we̩ ke̩ke̩ meji kpai oli sida kpai e̩wñ ekpikpa kpai oli hiso̩p wa, kʼi gwʼunyi le̩ rinyo̩.
Oñ i akpa e̩we̩ʼka tef ucha ku ma nʼama bo̩, oji omi ki acha,
tak i akʼoli sida kpai hiso̩p kpai e̩wñ ekpikpa manyʼe̩we̩ kʼi deju le̩ wa, oñ i akʼe-le̩ tunyʼe̩bie̩ e̩we̩ ku ma kpa, kpai tunyʼomi ki acha le̩, kʼi tafio̩ unyi le̩ onu mebie.
Abe̩le̩ i anʼe̩bie̩ e̩we̩ le̩ kpai omi ki acha kpai e̩we̩ kʼi deju kpai oli sida kpai hisop kpai e̩wñ ekpikpa le̩ gwʼunyi le̩ rinyo̩;
oñ i atʼe̩we̩ ki deju no̩ tʼo̩do̩da ewo le̩ tʼegbili pee; abe̩le̩ i ache e̩wñ e̩boma tod unyi le̩, tak i afe̩.
E-le̩ chʼuko̩-o̩la tod o̩ga ikpemute uche̩ uche̩ du kpai todu o̩ga e̩ru o̩la,
kpai todu o̩ga ikpemute ki dʼo̩la ukpo, abe̩k unyi,
kpai todu e̩dawu kpai todu eikpa kpai todu olula;
kʼi ko̩ ma iko kʼe̩wñ ma fe̩ n, kpai iko kʼi fe̩: uko̩-o̩la ugbo o̩ga ikpemute le̩ de̩.
